title: Improve text contrast for homepage value props and brand name

requirements.text: Update the text color styling so the homepage value proposition headings "Made with Care", "Quality Assured", and "Pure Ingredients" remain clearly readable with strong contrast against their card backgrounds in both light mode and dark mode.

quotes: make the font colour visible in made with care Quality Assured pure ingredients and brand BAU SARAS

acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, the headings "Made with Care", "Quality Assured", and "Pure Ingredients" are visibly readable (no low-contrast/washed-out appearance) in light mode.
On the Home page, the headings "Made with Care", "Quality Assured", and "Pure Ingredients" are visibly readable (no low-contrast/washed-out appearance) in dark mode.

requirements.text: Update the header brand name text styling so the brand name "BAU SARAS" remains clearly readable with strong contrast against the header background in both light mode and dark mode (avoid a hardcoded color that becomes low-contrast).

quotes: make the font colour visible in made with care Quality Assured pure ingredients and brand BAU SARAS

acceptanceCriteria: In the sticky header, the brand name text (e.g., "BAU SARAS") is clearly readable in light mode.
In the sticky header, the brand name text (e.g., "BAU SARAS") is clearly readable in dark mode.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not modify the Internet Identity hooks in frontend/src/hooks (read-only paths in system context).
nonGoals: No changes to product data, cart behavior, or navigation.
No changes to logo upload behavior or brand-name editing behavior beyond text color/styling.
